scripts.make-dirs: mkdir -p public/static/css && mkdir -p functions/assets && mkdir -p functions/config
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && npm run make-dirs
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && stylus -c -w src/app/views/styles --out public/static/css
scripts.serve: npm run createFirebaseConf && firebase serve --only hosting,functions
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run createFirebaseConf && firebase deploy --only hosting,functions
